comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of small bottles
- y: number of large bottles

Extracted Constraints:
- Total small bottles: x \leq 300
- Total large bottles: y \leq 100
- Twice as many small bottles as large bottles: x \geq 2y
- Total bottles: x + y \leq 200
- Minimum large bottles: y \geq 50

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 5x + 20y
